# osmbus

osmbus is an R package which exports
[OpenStreetMap](https://www.openstreetmap.org) bus lines to GPX.

# Example

```r
library(osmbus)
write_gpx(id_rel = "3201308") # get the data online
write_gpx(id_rel = "bus1.osm") # local file (contains full data about the relation)
```
